TEXT.TITLE: UNITED ARTISTS <UACI.O> SUSPENDS MERGER TALKS
TEXT.BODY: United Artists Communications Inc and <United Cable Television Corp> said they have indefinitely suspended negotiations on a proposed merger of their companies previously announced. The companies cited a combination of extraordinary market conditions and unresolved terms of the merger as contributing to the action. Reuter
